descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Victor Oladipo credits his teammates and says that they made things easy for him on the offensive end in the Pacers' 121-87 blowout win over the Cavaliers.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Oladipo reflects on blowout win in Game 6) 2018/04/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Oladipo reflects on blowout win in Game 6

videos.description: After getting run out of the gym in Game 6, LeBron James is straightforward about how he and the Cavs will handle Game 7 in Cleveland.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (LeBron on Game 7: 'Win or go home. It's that simple') 2018/04/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron on Game 7: 'Win or go home. It's that simple'

videos.description: Cavaliers' coach Tyronn Lue looks ahead to Game 7 against the Pacers and explains that they'll be fine back in Cleveland.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (Lue says 'we'll be ready to play' in Game 7) 2018/04/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lue says 'we'll be ready to play' in Game 7
